intro:
dbc is a deck building card game where utilising
 the best strategy and building the strongest deck is crucial to victory. 

Playing cards from your hand into the active area increases your attack and money.
The central line consists of all 
the cards that you may buy using the money from the active cards.

Buying cards strengthens your deck and brings you closer to victory.

Build the strongest deck and destroy your opponent!

gopts:
Choose action: 
P = play all 
[0-n] = play card
B = buy card
A = attack
E = end turn

shopstr: Cards that you buy here will go directly to your discard pile. They are shuffled into your main deck at the end of your turn
